game_description: Welcome to Beknight! Beknight Grandpa keeps you locked in his house. Now you have to try to get out of his house, but be careful and quiet. he hears everything. If you try going outside then he comes running. You can hide in wardrobes or under beds. You have 1 day. Good luck!
review_1: This game used to be good when if rest found out about it and it was fun to play with randoms but after some time of not playing it got worse 1. There were no people 2. I tried to play with my friend and tinge moment we moved we got into a glitchy situations dm we couldnâ€™t even play together. So I beg you to fix it and keep working on the game because it does have a lot of potential
review_2: Bro, you have to walk really really really really really slow or else your game will freaking self destruct. If you run A MOLECULE to fast it breaks, LIKE BRO
review_3: why did you stopped working on the game? It was gonna be a great game.
review_5: This is probably the scariest and best horror game every I got so scared that I had nightmares of the robber that sings pepa pig Five star definitely
